Discovered a web application with a heavily obfuscated JavaScript file
Used JavaScript Beautifier and other deobfuscation techniques and tools to make the code more readable
Identified functions and variables seemed to be related to the flag
Discovered the flag was split into multiple parts and obfuscated or encoded in different ways
Decoded and extracted each part of the flag from the JavaScript code
Combined the parts to obtain the full flag required to complete the Web Exploitation challenge
